meanings.definition: A group of extinct amphibians with labyrinthine tooth structure.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed fascinating labyrinthodonts from ancient times.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study labyrinthodonts to learn more about prehistoric creatures.
meanings.sent3: The labyrinthodonts in the exhibit seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: The complexity of labyrinthodonts' teeth is like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the intricate teeth of the labyrinthodonts.

meanings.definition: An ancient order of amphibians characterized by their complex teeth.
meanings.sent1: Explorers discovered mysterious labyrinthodonts deep in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The ancient drawings depicted various species of labyrinthodonts.
meanings.sent3: The labyrinthodonts in the pond were having a tooth-brushing competition.
meanings.sent4: In legends, labyrinthodonts were believed to guard hidden treasures with their teeth.
meanings.sent5: The intricate teeth of labyrinthodonts were like tiny mazes in their mouths.

meanings.sent1: Paleontologists unearthed well-preserved labyrinthodonts in the desert.
meanings.sent2: The museum exhibit showcased the evolution of labyrinthodonts over time.
meanings.sent3: The fossilized labyrinthodonts seemed to be smiling in their rocky tombs.
meanings.sent4: The labyrinthine teeth of these ancient amphibians were like keys to the past.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the labyrinthodonts' teeth fascinated visitors.
